TextView.android:text: For the BEST TEACHER in the world!!

HAPPY BIRTHDAY MRS ROBERTSON. Words can not express how much I appreciate you. From the first day you taught me, I knew it would be an experience of a lifetime. You have touched my heart and inspired me to strive for excellence. Everyday I woke up, I wanted to go to school because I knew I would be able to see you on my timetable. You made an experience I dreaded and turned it into a journey of excitement. Throughtout all the up's and down's, you were always there to support me. You always gave the best advice to me and everyone you knew and always listened to anything and everything we had brought up to you. Looking back at the years i've known you ma'am, it has been the best years if my life especally towards the end of my last year of school and I would never want to trade anything else for that. If there's one thing I could buy you, it would be the universe because that's what you mean to me. Of course the flowers are a must with red-bull and a lovely note too. Have a great day today Ma'am
